Content: 7 Sri Lanka National Guard (SLNG) troops of the 652 Brigade under the 65 Division of the Security Force Headquarters - Kilinochchi carried out a self-help ‘Shramadana’ project at Horana Hada Church in Akkarayankulam, Kilinochchi on Thursday (6). Major General Hemantha Bandara, General Officer Commanding, 65 Division, supervised the project. 11 Army personnel and 6 civilians participated in the community project, together with the 652 Brigade Commander who also coordinated the event.
